posts.title: Understanding JavaScript Closures
posts.content: JavaScript closures are a powerful feature that allows functions to retain access to their lexical scope even when the function is executed outside that scope.

posts.title: A Guide to CSS Flexbox
posts.content: CSS Flexbox is a layout model that provides an efficient way to lay out, align, and distribute space among items in a container.

posts.title: Getting Started with React
posts.content: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces. It allows developers to create large web applications that can change data without reloading the page.
